Issue.description: Today, our python code uses only one core. Because we use deques between processes, it lends itself fairly easily to a multi-process architecture. This story has us improving performance of nodes by leveraging more available cores on the server.The following plan of attack assumes usage of ZeroMQ, another option can be RPCh4.
